event.title: Annual Tech Summit 2026
event.description: Join us for our biggest event of the year! The Annual Tech Summit features inspiring keynote speakers from leading tech companies, hands-on workshops covering the latest technologies, and networking opportunities with industry professionals. Don't miss this chance to expand your knowledge and connect with fellow tech enthusiasts!

event.title: Web Development Workshop
event.description: Learn modern web development with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Hands-on coding session with experienced developers.

event.title: Hackathon 2026
event.description: 48-hour coding challenge where teams compete to build innovative solutions to real-world problems. Exciting prizes await!
